name: Claude Code 2.1.0

name: Axel

name: Qwen3.5 Qwen Code
description: Open-source AI coding agent framework optimized for terminal with native multimodal capabilities and instruction following.

name: Code Arena
description: Compare multiple AI coding applications at once by entering a prompt once and seeing outputs from top AI programming models side-by-side.

name: AionUi
description: Free open-source multi-AI Agent desktop tool with cross-platform support, multi-session parallel processing, and local data storage.

name: Zhipu GLM-5
description: 745B parameter MoE model with strong focus on complex coding and autonomous agents.

name: Visual Studio 2026
description: Microsoft's AI-native IDE with deep GitHub Copilot integration, 44% faster loading, modern Fluent UI, and .NET 10/C# 14 support.
community_quotes: Deep AI integration not bolted on

name: Inspector
description: Visual editing tool for AI coding assistants that connects with Claude Code, Codex, and Cursor for visual adjustments that auto-write to codebase.

name: JetBrains AI Assistant
description: Deep IDE integration with complex refactoring support, debugging assistance, project-level context awareness, and natural language commands for unit tests.
